description.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"The Linked Learning Office helps high schools develop Linked Learning pathways. Linked Learning is the district’s high school strategy where students pick a career pathway (engineering, fashion, etc), take courses in this area, and complete an internship. ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"hyperlink","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Learn more about Linked Learning","marks":[{"type":"underline"}],"data":{}}],"data":{"uri":"https://www.ousd.org/domain/4354"}},{"nodeType":"text","value":".","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}}]}
